body: Honestly, I'm just shocked that Sakai manned up and dumped her. Could've done with seeing the aftermath of her listening to his voicemail and the realization that it's all over.
This is the best. I'm real hard right now!

~ Fridays Extracurricular Lesson ~  He left her!? Man, he deserves some praise… only way it could have been better… is if he confronted/reported the teacher to the police and let her live her life with the stigmata once they hauled him away and the affair becomes public knowledge which I assume will probably would happen… eventually anyway.
